title: Selection Sort
subject: Algorithms
theory:
Divide list into sorted (left) and unsorted (right). 
1. Find minimum in unsorted part.
2. Swap it with first element of unsorted.
3. Move boundary.

interview_questions.question: Advantage of Selection over Bubble?
interview_questions.answer: Selection Sort makes fewer swaps (Max O(n) swaps). Bubble sort can make O(n^2) swaps.

real_world_use_cases.description: If writing (swapping) is expensive but reading is cheap, Selection sort minimizes writes.
